snippet.title: Hit the Button 3D - Game trailer
snippet.description:
Hit the Button is a platform game in which the main objective is to press all the buttons in each level. It is a game comprised of jumping and platforming, puzzles and brain teasers.
Each level presents a challenge as it has different design ranging from easy levels where you will have to perform simple jumps and difficult levels with more complex jumps, with puzzles and riddles.

Features:
■ Several levels to unlock with different designs.
■ Improved graphics and cartoon style. 
■ Dynamic platforms, which can move, rotate or drop you.
■ A main map through which to access the game's maps.
■ Levels with lava, don't touch it or you will lose the level.


*You do not need an internet connection to play. Cellular data charges may apply.
* May include advertising.

The game will be updated to add new levels and game modes.

Donwload
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.FerAnimaciones.HittheButton
